item.description:
@frank wrote:

maybe you should have a loop

while (token2_2.indexOf("\t\t" > 0) { token2_2.replace("\t\t", "\t"); }

item.title: Weird code
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

Is there any point in:

[php]
token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", “\t”);
token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", “\t”);
token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", “\t”);
token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", “\t”);
token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", “\t”);
[/php]

Couldn’t I just do it once? I don’t use multiple tabs.

Read full topic
